sentences.sContent: Either way, both the hare and tortoise get what they deserve based on how they behave.
sentences.sContent_eng: Either way, both the hare and tortoise get what they deserve based on how they behave.
sentences.sCn: 无论如何，野兔和乌龟得到什么都是基于它们的行为举止的。

phrases.pCn: 龟甲；一种类似龟甲的蝴蝶

trans.tranOther: a slow-moving land animal that can pull its head and legs into the hard round shell that covers its body
